# wxone_key (Resource)

Manages a key.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "wxone_project" "default" {}

resource "wxone_key" "example" {
  name         = "example"
  public_key   = "ssh-rsa  ubuntu@cw-development"
  project_wide = true
  project_id   = data.wxone_project.default.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the key.
- `project_wide` (Boolean) Should the key be used project wide or tied to the user.
- `public_key` (String) The public key of the key.

### Optional

- `private_key` (String) The private key of the key.
- `project_id` (String) If the key should be used project wide the corresponding project id.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID of the key in UUID format.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Key can be imported by specifying the id and projectId.
terraform import wxone_key.example 6782c04d-62d0-4273-a523-7b3d33e60643:c935bdbd-b6d3-4617-aa62-05be1aa6b4a6
```
